text: The Futrono-Riñihue Batholith () is a group of plutons in the Andes of Los Ríos Region, southern Chile. The plutons date to the Permian.Campos C., Alberto; Moreno R., Hugo; Muñoz B., Jorge; Antinao R., José Luis; Clayton, James D.; Martin, Mark W.; SERNAGEOMIN (1998). Area de Futrono-Lago Ranco, región de Los Lagos, Escala 1:100.000 [monografías]. Santiago : SERNAGEOMIN: 1 mapa pleg (Mapas Geológicos : n.08) == References == Category:Batholiths of South America Category:Lithodemic units of Chile Category:Geology of Los Ríos Region Category:Permian Chile Category:Permian magmatism
title: Futrono-Riñihue Batholith
